F is for Frames

Frames are used to design animations

An animation is created using still images called frames. Each frame is displayed for a split second before showing the next frame. The animation shown above was created using 10 frames. The frames are ordered in such a way that it gives the effect the ninja is running. See the controls

Controls
  • Animate the sprite for one loop
  • Animate the sprite indefinately
  • Stop the sprite animation

References

The following other lessons have been referenced:
